subject: Re: Using the Reflection API for private methods? Package access?
msgSnippet: ... ya.. there s always someone getting it wrong ;-)  But debate is good... it make people challenge their ideas. ... I ll add my vote for that approach... and
messageBody:
--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, "J. B. Rainsberger" <jbrains@r...> wrote:
> >So said javainsel on 4/13/2003 --------------------
> >1. We separate the test cases in an own package. Is that best
> >practice?
>
> There is debate on this.

ya.. there's always someone getting it wrong ;-) But debate is
good... it make people challenge their ideas.

> I feel that it is best to test classes through a public interface.

I'll add my vote for that approach... and the rest of JB's comments.

Dave
